file_content.text: Stop! Please, wait!
We need this generator! If you destroy it, we'll all die!
Your life is of no concern to me.
That isn't my problem.
Honestly, with the way things are on this planet, you'd probably be better off.
Death isn't so bad.
Please, I... I don't ask much.
The Empire hired me to smash this thing. Nothing personal.
Sorry, a job's a job.
I have strict orders to disable this generator.
I have to destroy it.
Identify yourself.
Stand aside.
No, please! You don't understand.
My name is Min. My village was razed in the war. The few of us who survived came here to find shelter.
Please, we're not a part of the resistance. We haven't hurt anyone. We just needed someplace to go when our homes were destroyed.
The generator has to be destroyed, regardless of the situation.
That changes nothing.
Such a shame.
Even if you're not part of the resistance, you certainly profit by them.
I don't buy it.
Yes, they shared what they had with us--so what? Is a little charity such a crime?
I'm begging you. We won't survive without power, and we have nowhere else to go. Can't you just leave the generator running?
I suppose there's no harm in leaving the generator with you.
Very well. I won't destroy it.
Thank you, thank you so much!
In the future, you should avoid mixing with the resistance.
Stay out of trouble.
We'll stay away from them from now on--I swear it.
I'm glad I could spare you from any more suffering.
You're welcome.
You're very generous. We owe you our lives.
I'd better not regret it.
We won't, I swear it.
Thanks again.
Stand aside, unless you want to go with it.
No. It must be destroyed.
Ahh!
But... but what will we do? How will we survive now?
Toughen up and deal with your problems. Stop relying on charity.
Find a way.
That's easy for you to say. Not everyone has your... skills.
Your problems aren't my concern.
Don't ask me.
Survival is out of the question at this point.
You won't.
I can't believe you would be so cold.
What are we going to do....
